191684.「びぇええええええん！！\n ごめんなさい ゴメンナサイぃいいい！\n い い:
Beeeeeeee!! I'm sorry, I'm so sorry!! No, no,
Just save my life, please!!

191685.「そ…ソイツは ポイックリンなんかじゃないよ！\n いったい アンタ なんなんだ:
That's... that's not Poiclin! What the hell
are you?

191686.「ぼ 僕 ダークポイックリンを\n 捕まえようと思って 忍び込んだんです～！: I snuck in to try to catch Dark Poiclin~!

191687.「ポイックリンの姿で 悪事を働くアイツを\n どうしても 見過ごせなくて……。:
I just couldn't let him go on doing his evil
deeds in his Poiclin guise.

191688.「まったく なんて人騒がせな奴なんだい！\n 黒服さん。ソイツは怪盗じゃないよ。:
What a disturbing man you are! Mr. Black, he's
not a thief. He's not a thief. He's not worth
catching, so let him go.

191690.「フフッ。皆さん 勢ぞろいで\n ずいぶん お楽しみじゃないの。\n 私も まぜ:
Hmmm. You're all having so much fun here.
Please let me join you.

191691.「天知る！ 地知る！ 人ぞ知る！: Know the sky! The earth knows! Man knows!

191692.「美少女怪盗ポイックリン！\n 本日も 華麗に 任務完了でございますわっ！:
Phantom Thief Poiclin! Today, too, we have
completed our mission with flying colors!

191693.「ち ちくしょう……ちくしょうっ……！\n これ以上 ポイックリン様の\n 名誉:
Damn it... damn it...! Don't disgrace Master
Poiclin any further!

191694.「おーっほっほっほ！ な～んて ブザマなの。\n こんなに 床をなめるのが 似合:
Oh-ho-ho! What a booze. I've never seen a guy
who looks so good licking the floor!

191695.「それでは皆さん ごきげんよう。: Well then, good day to you all.

191696.「チリも残さず\n キレイに退散ですわっ！: We left clean and without a speck of Chiri!

191697.「けほっ！ こんな物で 私を 捕まえられると\n 思ってるなんて おめでたい人達:
Keho-ho! You people are so naive to think you
can catch me with that! You just sit there and
watch with your fingers crossed!

191698.「くそっ くそっ……！\n アイツが 目の前にいたのに\n 僕は また 何もでき:
Arghhh...! He was right in front of
me and I couldn't do anything.

191699.「僕は やっぱり ダメな男なんだっ……！！: I'm still a bad guy after all...!

191700.「涙ってのは テメェを哀れんで\n 流すモンじゃねえ……。: Tears aren't meant to be shed for pity...

191701.「涙っていうのは 自分自身を 変えるため\n もがき苦しんだヒトが 流すものよ！:
Tears are shed by those who have struggled to
change themselves!

191702.「ふふっ！ ポイックリンの姿じゃ\n 入場させてもらえないでしょ？\n だから:
Phew! They wouldn't let me enter as Poiclin,
right? That's why I disguised myself as a man
in black.

191703.「か 怪盗ポイックリンが ふたり！？\n いったい どういうことなんだいッ。:
Two Phantom Thief Poiclins? What on earth is
going on?

191704.「なるほど。悪事を 働いていたのは\n ニセモノだった……というわけですか。:
I see. So it was a phony who was doing
evil....

191705.「<pc>。私がアイツに 投げたのは\n ドラキーマのフェロモンを たっぷり詰め:
<pc>. I threw him a tracking ball
filled with Drackyma's pheromones, the thief's
secret tool.

191706.「だから 今から ドラキーマを追って\n アイツのアジトを 突き止めましょう。\:
So now we're going to follow Drackyma and find
out where he's hiding. I'll be right behind
you.

191707.「ぼ 僕も ついて行きますっ……！\n ダークポイックリンの悪事を 止めたいし…:
I'll go with you. I want to stop Dark Poiclin
from doing evil, and I want to change my
uncool self.

191708.「わかったわ ピンチョ。一緒に行きましょ。\n でも 私達に ついて来られなかっ:
Okay, Pincho. We'll go with you. But if you
don't follow us, we'll leave you here without
mercy!

191709.「あの方向は……。\n <pc>。一旦 ガタラに戻って\n ダルルたちから 話を:
That direction is... <pc>. Let's go
back to Gatara and talk to Darul and the
others.

191710.「それじゃ 私は先に向かっているわ。\n ガタラの酒場で 合流ね！:
Well, I'll be on my way. I'll meet you at the
tavern in Gatara!

191711.「や…やめなさいよっ！この アホドラキーマ！\n あァもう 何度 追いはらっても:
No... stop it! You stupid drachma! Oh my God,
no matter how many times I chase you...!

191712.「あ……アンタ達！ アンタ達のしわざでしょ！\n よくも 私のプライベート空間を:
You! You did this to me! How dare you take my
private space! I'll never forgive you!

191713.「き……キミは どうして ポイックリンの姿で\n 悪事をはたらくんだ！ 一体 ポ:
Why are you doing evil in the form of
Poiclin? What the hell do you have against
Poiclin?

191714.「……なんの恨みが あるかだって？: What do you have against me?

191715.「私にはね かつて 幼なじみの婚約者がいたの。\n 昔から いつも 私にベッタリ:
I once had a childhood sweetheart fiancee. He
was the kind of person who always stuck to me
and followed me everywhere.

191716.「私も そんな彼のことを 愛していた。\n だから プロポーズされて 結婚が決ま:
I loved him too. So it didn't take long for
him to propose and for us to decide to get
married. But...

191717.「いよいよ 式を挙げようって日の朝。\n ……僕を探さないでくださいって 書かれ:
On the morning of the day of the wedding.
...he disappeared, leaving only a letter
asking not to look for me.

191718.「町の人は 彼が ポイックリンに入れあげて\n 追っかけをしてるなんて ウワサし:
People in town were saying he was obsessed
with Poiclin and chasing after him. I said it
was a lie and ran to Gatara...

191720.「でも そこで 私が 何を見たと思う！？\n ポイックリンを 大はしゃぎで\n:
But you know what I saw there? I saw my hunky
ex-fiancee chasing after Poiclin like a
fiancee on a spree!

191721.「……それから 部屋にこもり 泣きぬれていると\n ある日 アイツが 現れたの。:
...and then one day, while I was hiding in my room, sobbing my eyes out, she showed up. She said she was called by your anger and
sadness...

191722.「あの男とポイックリンが のうのうと\n 幸せに暮らしているのを 許せるのか？\:
How can you allow that man and Poiclin to live
happily ever after? If you want revenge, I'll
help you.

191723.「私は アイツの手を取ったわ。\n だって アイツのほうが よほど\n 正しいこ:
I took her hand. Because I thought she was
saying more right than me!

191724.「それからは アンタ達も知ってのとおり……。\n ポイックリンの姿と能力を 手に:
After that, as you all know, I received
Poiclin's form and ability to cause all sorts
of mayhem.

191725.「フフッ。アンタの憧れの ポイックリンが\n 極悪怪盗として おとしめられ 憎ま:
Hmmm. Your adored Phantom Thief Poiclin is now
being demonized and hated as a villainous
thief... what could be more painful!

191727.「あァ……でも 甘美な復讐も ここまでね。\n だって アンタ達\n 全員 ここ:
But so much for sweet revenge. Because you're
all going to die here!

191728.「あの魔物たちは 私とピンチョで\n できるだけ おさえるから\n あなたは ダ:
Pincho and I will control those monsters as
best we can, and you take care of Dark
Poiclin!

191729.「あ～ら まだ生きていたの？\n でもダメよ。アンタたち\n 全員 ここで死にな:
Ah~rah, you're still alive? But no. You're all
going to die here!

191731.「ファヒータ……？\n いったい どういうこと？: Fajita...? What the hell is going on?

191732.「ご ごめん……。ダークポイックリンが\n 言っていた 幼なじみの元婚約者という:
Sorry... Dark Poiclin was referring to me as
your childhood friend's ex-fiancee...

191733.「彼女は ファヒータ。小さい頃から\n いつも一緒だった 幼なじみで ずっと昔\:
Her name is Fajita. We've always been together since we were little, childhood friends, and we promised a long time ago that we would
marry when we grew up.

191734.「彼女は その約束を ずっと信じていた。\n だから 大人になった途端 おどろく:
She had always believed in that promise. So, as soon as she became an adult, she proceeded with her wedding preparations with surprising
dexterity.

191735.「親族同士のあいさつ 招待状 式の準備……\n 彼女は あらゆる作業を 素早く完:
The family greetings, the invitations, the wedding preparations... she did everything quickly and flawlessly. I, on the other hand,
was just going through the motions.

191736.「僕は このままでいいのか 悩んでた……。\n だから 式の前日 ガタラ原野で考:
I was wondering if I could go on like this... so the day before the ceremony, I was in the Gatara Fields thinking about it, and I found
myself surrounded by monsters.

191737.「もうダメだって そう思ったとき\n 怪盗ポイックリンが さっそうと現れて 僕を:
Just when I thought I was about to lose it,
Phantom Thief Poiclin came out of nowhere and
saved my life! How cool was that?

191738.「ぼ…僕は 自分が 情けなくなったよ。\n このままじゃ 何かあっても 彼女を守:
I feel ashamed of myself. I couldn't protect
her if something happened to her. That's why I
thought I had to be strong too.

191739.「そう思って 置き手紙を残して ガタラへ修行に\n 出たんだ。それが まさか こ:
That's what I thought, so I left a note and
went to Gatara to train. I had no idea that I
had hurt Fajita so much...

191740.「本当に強くなったら ちゃんと僕自身のチカラで\n ファヒータに プロポーズしよ:
When I get really strong, I will propose to
Fajita with my own power... I'm a big fool...
I'm really sorry, Fajita.

191742.<center>本当に それで よいのですか……？\nその男の姿を よく ごらん:
Are you sure that's a good idea? Take a good
look at that man.

191744.「ウソをつけッ！ テメェは 直前になって\n 他の女に 目移りしたんだ！\n 地:
Liar! You had your eye on another woman at
the last minute! You'll pay for that in hell!

191745.「キェーキェッキェキェーッ！！\n この女の 憎しみのパワーは\n 相変わらず:
Keekkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkk!!! The
power of this woman's hatred is as awesome as
ever.

191746.「あ…アンタ 何出てきてんのよ！！\n 今は 引っ込んでなさいッ。:
What are you coming out here for? Now, stay
back.

191747.「私は 憎しみをあおって 糧にする\n 悪魔キェルグ……。かつて 婚約者に裏切ら:
Your hatred is what sustains me...I am
Kukulkannihawker. The hatred born from this
woman's betrayal is what drew me here.

191748.「キェキェッ。この女は 私と契約したのデス。\n 悪魔のチカラを 使えるようにす:
Kikki. This woman made a contract with me. She said she would give me the power of the demon in exchange for the hatred that feeds my
power...

191749.「それ以降 私はこの女の 憎しみを受け取り\n その代わりに 悪魔のチカラで\n:
From then on, I received this woman's hatred,
and in return, I used my demon powers to give
her the ability to change and fly.

191750.「しかし たった今 私の目的を達成するのに\n 充分なチカラが 手に入りマシタ…:
But now I have enough power to achieve my
goal...

191751.「つまり お前はもう 用済みなんですヨッ！\n 後は その無用な意識を奪い去り:
Yo! In other words, you are no longer of any use to us! All that's left is to take away his useless consciousness and resurrect him with
your body!

191752.「ハッ……はは！ 笑える。婚約者に裏切られて\n 手を差しのべてきた奴にも だま:
Ha...ha! That's funny. You mean to tell me that your fiancee betrayed you and the guy who reached out to you also tricked you into
losing consciousness? Ha ha ha!

191753.「まったく 信じる相手を 二度もしくじった\n 私には お似合いの末路ね。\n:
I've screwed up twice with people I believe
in, so I guess I deserve what I get. Go ahead,
try it. I'll take it from here!

191754.「キェキェ！ その夜叉のような 美しさ……。\n 魔物じゃないのが 惜しい逸材デ:
Keekkie! Your beauty like a nightshade... it's
a shame you're not a monster! Yo! I'll possess
you as you wish!

191756.「ファヒータ……よかった…………。\n 早く……逃げ…………: Fajita... thank God... hurry... run... away...

191757.「ギェッ！ なんですか これは！！\n よりによって こんなヤツに……ッ。:
Geez! What is this? Of all people, for such a
guy to do this...!

191758.「仕方ナイ……。想定外のトラブルは\n ありましたが 私の目的を 達成するには\:
I had no choice... there were some unforeseen
problems, but nothing that would hinder me
from achieving my goal...

191760.「おっと……。今の私を 倒したら\n この身体の持ち主も 死んでしまいますヨ？\:
If you defeat me now, the owner of this body
will also die, right? If that's okay with you,
go ahead! Keekkie!

191761.「今こそ あなたを 復活させマス。\n …………クァバルナ様。:
Now is the time to revive you. ...Kwabarna-
sama.

191762.「<cs_pchero>。ひとまず ガタラへ戻って\n これから どうすべきかを:
<cs_pchero>. For now, let's go back to
Gatara and discuss what we should do.

191763.「私は 彼女を 連れていくから\n ガタラの酒場で 合流しましょう。\n またあ:
I'll take her and we'll meet up at Gatara's
tavern. See you later. <cs_pchero>.

191764.「みんな いろいろと黙っていて ごめんね。\n じつは 私のニセモノが 暴れてい:
I'm sorry for keeping quiet about all this.
Actually, I've known for quite some time that
my impostor has been running amok...

191765.「こうして 私自身で 調査を始めたのは\n ニセモノに 盗まれた物の中に\n あ:
Thus, I began my own investigation because one
of the items stolen by the impostor contained
the book, "Heavenly Demon Revelation.

191766.「そう……以前 ドゥラ院長が解読した歴史書よ。:
Yes... the history book that Director Dura
deciphered some time ago.

191767.「そして 思ったとおり あのキェルグって悪魔が\n 天魔クァバルナを 復活させよ:
And just as I thought, that Devil Kyerug seems
to be plotting to bring back Kukulkannibal.

191768.「私のニセモノ騒ぎは カモフラージュで\n 本当の狙いは そっちだったっていうこ:
My phony fuss was just camouflage, and that's
what they were really after... but I'm
determined to stop that from happening.

191769.「……天魔クァバルナのせいで 不幸になる人を\n これ以上 出しちゃいけないから:
I don't want any more people to be unhappy
because of Kukulkannibal.

191770.「それで ニセモノを泳がせながら\n 情報を集めて 捕まえようとしたんだけど\n:
So I let the phony swim around, gathering
intel and trying to catch him, but I never
thought Pincho would become possessed.

191771.「彼女……ファヒータは 休ませているわ。\n 悪魔のチカラを 使っていた影響なの:
She...Fajita is resting. She's been weakened
by the effects of the demon's power.

191772.「私は ファヒータが 目覚めるまで\n あの悪魔の 次のターゲットについて\n:
I'll keep investigating that demon's next
target until Fajita wakes up.

191773.「何か動きがあったら また 連絡する。\n ピンチョを助けだして クァバルナの復:
I'll keep you posted on any developments. We
need everyone's help to rescue Pincho and stop
the resurrection of Quavarna!

194217.「かつて 天魔クァバルナに 苦しめられた民が\n 奴について調べ上げて 残したと:
The people who were once tormented by
Kukulkannibal have done a lot of research on
him and left behind...

199200.<pc>は 岳都ガタラの酒場で\nポイックリンたちと 合流する約束をして\nカジ:
<pc> left the Casino with a promise
to meet up with Poiclin and the others at a
tavern at Mount Gatara...

199433.<center>さあ 思いだすのです……。\nあの時の 苦痛を……。: Now, remember... the pain of that moment.

199435.「バカピンチョ！ アンタ ほんとバカ！\n ほんと なんにも わかってないッ！:
Stupid Pincho! You're so stupid! You really
don't know anything!
